mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop_group (ip, enabled, createddate, modifiedDate, shopName, priority, parentShopGroupId) VALUES ( #{ip}, #{enabled}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{shopName}, #{priority}, #{parentShopGroupId} );
mapper.update: UPDATE shop_group SET ip = #{ip}, enabled = #{enabled}, modifiedDate = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, shopName = #{shopName}, priority = #{priority} WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.select: SELECT id, enabled, shopName, priority, parentShopGroupId FROM shop_group WHERE parentShopGroupId IS NULL LIMIT 10;
